title: Shawl Fragment, 19th century
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: twill weave with supplementary weft
description: Multi-colored wools brocaded on black wool twill ground in a crudely rendered small-scale floral and bird pattern. Probably machine woven.

tombstone.epitaph:
Shawl Fragment, 19th century.Medium: wool
Technique: twill weave with supplementary weft. 1957-115-5.
